prompt_text:
Content Title Creation Brief
Objective: craft 5 link-ready titles for https://www.lineups.com/betting/michigan/ that feel at home on buddymagazine.org.

Reference SERP keyword: casino
Anchor keyword (use only if natural): Michigan online sports betting

Anchor operates in: Unspecified

Reference titles:

- How Software Drives the Future of Gaming Online

- Sharon Stone Age and How She Defies Time in Hollywood

Guidance:
1. Combine your own knowledge of buddymagazine.org's catalog with the SERP references to surface authentic angles.
2. Make every title feel native to buddymagazine.org while naturally justifying a link to https://www.lineups.com/betting/michigan/.
3. Use the anchor text only when it reads naturally inside supporting copy, never inside the title.
4. Titles must exclude Michigan online sports betting and any casino/operator brand names entirely; reserve brand mentions for rationales.
5. If extra notes or your knowledge indicate a placement locale, tailor the titles accordingly; otherwise keep them globally applicable while acknowledging Unspecified where useful.
6. Incorporate any extra campaign notes: .
7. Keep every title free of review or promo phrasing (e.g., avoid 'review', 'bonus', 'promo code').

Examples:
- Bad: "Casiny online casino review" (violates brand + review rule).
- Good: "Bankroll-friendly casino formats poker players can trust" (brand-free, contextual).

Return JSON exactly as {"titles": [{"title": "...", "rationale": "..."}]} with 5 items.
